description.zh-cn: 中国蚊虫研究专家，曾任云南省寄生虫病防治所研究员。
description.en: A Chinese expert in mosquito research, formerly a researcher at the Yunnan Provincial Institute of Parasitic Diseases Control.
The ruling political party of China.

nodes.id: 云南省寄生虫病防治所

zh-cn: 云南省寄生虫病防治所
en: Yunnan Provincial Institute of Parasitic Diseases Control

description.zh-cn: 由董学书撰写，云南科技出版社于2014年出版的关于中国按蚊分类的著作。
description.en: A work on the classification of Anopheles in China, written by Dong Xueshu and published by Yunnan Science and Technology Press in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 由董学书撰写，云南科技出版社于2019年8月出版的关于中国覆蚊属的著作。
description.en: A work on the Aedine mosquitoes of China, written by Dong Xueshu and published by Yunnan Science and Technology Press in August 2019.

description.zh-cn: 董学书撰写的关于云南按蚊的检索图。
description.en: An identification atlas of Anopheles in Yunnan written by Dong Xueshu.

nodes.id: 中国媒介蚊种图谱及其分类

zh-cn: 中国媒介蚊种图谱及其分类

description.zh-cn: 董学书撰写的关于中国媒介蚊种的图谱和分类著作。
description.en: An atlas and classification work on Chinese vector mosquitoes written by Dong Xueshu.

description.zh-cn: 董学书是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Dong Xueshu is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 云南省寄生虫病防治所

description.zh-cn: 董学书曾是云南省寄生虫病防治所的研究员。
description.en: Dong Xueshu was formerly a researcher at the Yunnan Provincial Institute of Parasitic Diseases Control.

description.zh-cn: 董学书撰写了《中国按蚊分类检索》。
description.en: Dong Xueshu authored 'Classification and Identification of Anopheles in China'.

description.zh-cn: 云南科技出版社于2014年出版了《中国按蚊分类检索》。
description.en: Yunnan Science and Technology Press published 'Classification and Identification of Anopheles in China' in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 董学书撰写了《中国覆蚊属》。
description.en: Dong Xueshu authored 'Aedine Mosquitoes of China'.

description.zh-cn: 云南科技出版社于2019年8月出版了《中国覆蚊属》。
description.en: Yunnan Science and Technology Press published 'Aedine Mosquitoes of China' in August 2019.

description.zh-cn: 董学书撰写了《云南按蚊检索图》。
description.en: Dong Xueshu authored 'Identification Atlas of Anopheles in Yunnan'.

relationships.target: 中国媒介蚊种图谱及其分类

description.zh-cn: 董学书撰写了《中国媒介蚊种图谱及其分类》。
description.en: Dong Xueshu authored 'Atlas and Classification of Chinese Vector Mosquitoes'.
